name: Whole Hole
description:
DESCRIPTION

In this game you will continuously kill hordes of increasingly country enemies and civilians, breading hell with sacrifices as quickly as possible. You have decreasing progress bar, which you fill by throwing everything in hell hole. When you fully fill progress bar - you increase your level, by sacrificing half of your efficiency. After level up count of enemies will grow up and there will be more powerful knights coming to help!

HOW TO PLAY:

TO START GAME PRESS BUTTON PRESS BUTTON "START GAME" OR THROW CHICKEN IN THE HOLE

You should stun your target by punch, if you want take him. When you have someone in your hand, and press RMB - you just throw it. But if you press and hold RMB - you charge throw strength, and throw by releasing RMB button (throw strength is not limited). 

CONTROLS: 

WSAD - Movement
LMB - Punch. 
RMB - Take object, or throw,if you hold something
(charging throw by holding button)
